alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 20 at 3:09AM PDT until March 20 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 40 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range, Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. A few power outages are possible. In the Ruby Mountaings, dangerous crosswinds and patchy blowing snow could lead to difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
